sqlite.preamble:
PRAGMA journal_mode = WAL;
PRAGMA synchronous = NORMAL;

queries.insert: INSERT INTO bench (name, value, created_at) VALUES (?, ?, ?)
queries.update: UPDATE bench SET value = ? WHERE id = ?

queriesPg.insert: INSERT INTO bench (name, value, created_at) VALUES ($1, $2, $3)
queriesPg.update: UPDATE bench SET value = $1 WHERE id = $2
